item.title: Alert Shortcode
item.description: This article shows how to use the alert shortcode.

item.title: Media Shortcodes
item.description: A detailed description of media shortcodes, such as Bilibili, Tencent, Youku, iQiyi and Netease Music.

item.title: Online IDE Shortcodes
item.description: A detailed description of online IDE shortcodes, such as JSFiddle, CodePen, JSRun.

item.title: Markdown 4 Use Shortcodes in hugo
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: MarkDown 3 Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: MarkDown 2 Placeholder Text
item.description: The key is to thrust the entire body tighter from the chest to the top of the chest.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Markdown 1 Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
